segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on the cookies that they don’t see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet, which makes this even riskier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
